description: Equivalent of, and wrapper around, an HTML input. Also supports textarea.

props.name: id
props.description: The id the input

props.name: modelValue
props.description: The value of the input

props.name: type
props.description: The type of input this is. NOTE: Neon provides custom components as alternatives in the following cases: * file (use NeonFile) * password (use NeonPassword)

props.name: placeholder
props.description: Placeholder text to display in the input

props.name: size
props.description: Size of the input

props.name: color
props.description: Color of the input

props.name: inputmode
props.description: The HTML input mode as specified here.

props.name: autocomplete
props.description: The HTML autocomplete mode as specified here. NOTE: No enum is provided in Neon as some values can be used in combination, please refer to the full list of values in the preceding link.

props.name: state
props.description: The state of the input

props.name: rows
props.description: The number of rows to display in the case of a textarea

props.name: icon
props.description: The name of a clickable icon to display inside the input. This is used for clearing contents or e.g. in the case of NeonPassword toggle showing/hiding the password. Defaults to times (for clearing the input's contents).

props.name: iconReadonly
props.description: Make the input field icon read-only, i.e. it will not emit events or be treated as a focusable button.

props.name: hideIcon
props.description: Hide the icon button, e.g. the X button to clear the input's contents.

props.name: tabindex
props.description: Tabindex to assign to the input.

props.name: disabled
props.description: The disabled state of the input

props.name: stateHighlight
props.description:
When the state is success or error, display the field with the state color indicator, e.g. border or background
color.

props.name: stateIcon
props.description: When the state is success or error, display the state icon.

props.name: maxlength
props.description: The character limit for a textarea.

props.name: maxlengthLabel
props.description: The label template for the character limit. This is a string in the vue-i18n Pluralization format with a {count} placeholder.

defaultValue.value: 'No characters left | 1 character left | {count} characters left'

props.name: debounce
props.description: Debounce time in ms. If no value is provided, the default value set in NeonDebounceUtils is used (=0ms).

events.name: focus
events.description: Emitted when the input has gained focus

events.name: blur
events.description: Emitted when the input has lost focus

events.name: icon-click
events.description: Emitted when the icon is clicked

events.name: update:modelValue
events.description: Emitted when the input value is changed, NOTE: is not triggered if input is over the textarea length limit
